name: strawbees-code-compiler-service
author: Paulo Barcelos <paulo@strawbees.com>
description: Cloud service that compiles Quirkbot programs.

scripts.deploy: git checkout master && git push && git push --tags && git checkout develop && git push && npm publish
scripts.deploy:stage: git checkout develop && eb deploy strawbees-code-compiler-service-stage
scripts.deploy:production: git checkout master && eb deploy strawbees-code-compiler-serviceproduction
